topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547e642a6368722dc3530000#post_547e642a6368722dc3530000
Well, she might have found me. Over the Thanksgiving weekend, my family went to a park with a train ride. We went on it (we say it's for my 9 year old cousin, but my freshman-in-college brother freaking loves trains so I'm assuming it was for him), but halfway through the ride, it broke down.

So I'm gonna assume any mechanical failures I experience in the near future is a sign of Giffany.
